metadata.title: CVE-2024-1671 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Site Isolation in Google Chrome prior to122.0.6261.57 allowed a remote attacker to bypass content security policyvia a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
